job_details.Functieomschrijving:
After completion of the Academy, you will join your Region's Team as an AI Engineer. You will develop AI solutions and services that help our clients achieve their business outcomes using AI & Analytics.This role requires data science skills such as exploration data analysis, feature engineering, and ML models training and testing.You will work with a range of technologies, including advanced analytics, computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLM), unsupervised learning, and optimization, all primarily powered by Microsoft Azure. You will also be involved in applying MLOps technology for deployments.

   Day-to-day you will:
     * Develop AI projects and solutions.
     * Assist in the preparation of client presentations and proposals.
     * Conduct research and analysis on AI and ML technologies and trends to stay up to date with the latest advancements.
     * Contribute to the creation of custom training materials and code examples for a wide variety of AI solutions.
     * Work with senior team members to analyze current business practices and identify future opportunities for leveraging advanced analytics and AI solutions.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer Academy - Netherlands

After completion of the Academy, you will join your Region's Team as an AI Engineer. You will develop AI solutions and services that help our clients achieve their business outcomes using AI & Analytics.This role requires data science skills such as exploration data analysis, feature engineering, and ML models training and testing.You will work with a range of technologies, including advanced analytics, computer vision, natural language processing (NLP), large language models (LLM), unsupervised learning, and optimization, all primarily powered by Microsoft Azure. You will also be involved in applying MLOps technology for deployments.

   Day-to-day you will:
     * Develop AI projects and solutions.
     * Assist in the preparation of client presentations and proposals.
     * Conduct research and analysis on AI and ML technologies and trends to stay up to date with the latest advancements.
     * Contribute to the creation of custom training materials and code examples for a wide variety of AI solutions.
     * Work with senior team members to analyze current business practices and identify future opportunities for leveraging advanced analytics and AI solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes data science skills like exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and ML model training/testing. It mentions a range of AI technologies including computer vision, NLP, and LLMs, but the core focus appears to be on developing AI solutions and services for clients, with a strong component of MLOps for deployments. While LLMs are mentioned, the overall description leans more towards traditional ML engineering tasks and applying AI/ML to business outcomes, rather than the specialized focus on generative AI applications and advanced prompt engineering characteristic of a GenAI Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'feature engineering' directly relates to preparing data for machine learning models.
The description explicitly mentions 'ML models training and testing' and 'unsupervised learning', which are core modeling activities.
The mention of 'advanced analytics' and 'optimization' implies the development and application of models.
The inclusion of 'computer vision', 'natural language processing (NLP)', and 'large language models (LLM)' indicates work with various types of AI models.
